reviews.review: Deleted scanes ı oynamanızı tavsiye ederim cs nin senaryolu versiyonu
how do i fix the problem with widescreen?
Cool cs game, i liked both campaing, singleplayer and multiplayer. Awesome ^^
el juego en la mision alamo se me cierra automaticante 5 minutos despues de iniciada tal mision
Pra mim é melhor que o 1.6
its a great game has some strategy too but, mostly fps

This is the classic FPS that made me addicted to FPS games. I have been playing this game for 7 years now and I still enjoy it. Although this games is old and the graphics may not be as good as the current CS games, it still is a good game to play!

Not too big of a difference from 1.6, but nevertheless, it's a nice game. It's pretty popular in France, and there is a lot of French players on it. But the game is dying, therefore, I recommend that you go with CS 1.6 instead of this.
Otimo Game , uma pena que ainda existe pessoas que usam XITER,     atrapalhando o jogo dequem gosta de conseguir honestamente experiencia.
the best counter strike game there is! better than counter strike:GO. all those people who say it's too old are blaspheming!

Condition Zero is only CS 1.6 with better models and textures, but Condition Deleted Scenes give cool campaning :) 
Game is worth to buy for campaning.
A little difference from cs 1.6 . I really enjoyed playing Resident Evil map.
Ever wanted to play Counter Strike but single player? I didn't think so, and if you were to play this you would probably think so too. It's so shit it hurts.

Sinceramente um jogo exelente. Jogabilidade bem diferente dos FPS ''Run and Shoot'' comuns, vários servidores diversificados, com plugins de vozes como ''double kill, monster kill, etc'' e também, a campanha é muito boa e dá pra treinar com bots.
Realmente vale a pena comprar.

une réference qui date mais qui reste un classique!. Ce fut l'un des premiers fps auquel j'ai jouer et j'ai encore plaisir d'y retourner. De conception simple comme les objectifs qui y sont a remplir. Vous avez vite fait de vous familliariser avec le gameplay et vous laisser prendre par l'action pure. Alors place au skill et a la strategie d'équipe !!. Si vous n'êtes pas un habitué des FPS je vous conseil de commencer par celui ci pour vous donner les bases !. Good Game !!

Una buena historia. que nos recordara una mezcla de Half life y CS1.6. Aunque un poquito corta. Es divertida.
Comprarlo si sois como yo que os gustaria que el CSGO tuviera un modo Historia.
Dobrá hra, prostě csko s úkolama
mais cedo ao mais tarde este vai ser o jogo cada vez mais jogado :

I recommend it because condition zero contains 2 different games in one pack

1) condition zero is counter strike in its classic formula with "single player missions" using bots (I find it funny to play)
2)"condition zero deleted scenes"  expansion pack contains a lot of single player missions with a story and original maps...it's like an action movie. If you like Call Of Duty games, I thinks that this expansion pack is similar to it in gameplay, but it's honestly is better than CoD.

so you have 2 good single player games in 1
It`s good game, but not like cs 1.6 :D
buenisimo  esta muy bien lo recomiendo
First CS game I ever played <3
Es un juego muy entretenido, sobre todo si lo juegas con amigos, te hechas unas risas
Os gráficos são um pouco melhor que o 1.6, mas o posicionamento das armas em punho ficaram estranhas.
its Fun To Play The Missions Thay Sould add that to CS:GO
seems the same as the rest of the CS games but dtill very cool to play and the sever groups arnt as annel
This is the best game for ever.
Игра потрясающая. Это мой мой первый шутер. Благодаря этой игре я полюбил шутеры от 1 лица
Counter Strike, klassinen FPS moninpeli. Paljon toimintaa ja hauska peli, helppo ja puolueeton. Takaan taattu hauskaa. Viestini oli 10/10 (jos haluat numerot)
Es algo viejo pero es bueno clasico del shooter C:
La historia es aburrida a la larga, además del inutilismo de varias cosas y personajes. Sin mencionar que es igual al Counter Strike comun con mas cosas.
В основном она мне помогает расслабиться во времена когда отключают интернет. Если у вас часты сбои я вам ее рекомендую.
great game bot are not instant killing aimers but thats good

The first of CS series I've ever played..

I don't need to describe how wonderful it is.

Just play it ;)
With minor bugs, it is better than the original version on steam, however has some offensive things to some people, as stated by valve as reason for pulling the plug on this varient.

very very good game just one thing i need to add why does my screen become black when i turn it on the game screen is black at the main menu and i can't play it .THis game is very action packed so basiclly some missons are hard some are not but i still do recmmoned this game
Czemu nie gracie w CS:CZ ? Przecież to Zajebista GRA :)

A pretty fun game. Filled with terrorism and shooty gun things, you play with bots or against real players in the multi-player mode. Its "Deleted Scenes" separate game has a single-player game-mode which is also pretty challenging and fun. Try it out, you'll probably enjoy it.
I think it is an okay game.  I'd play it more often if it was a little easier, but I think it is ok.  But I do see why people dislike it.
every cs game is good ! nothing else
Realemte sem palavras mt bao mermo ~~~!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

So this game was released on 2004, right between the Call of Duty and Call of Duty 2. COD 1 and 2 are Classic, you would love to replay the chapters after you finnish the single player, but for CS:CZ? One-time is enough. I am not saying I don't enjoy it, but replayability marks the disparity.
No esta mal para ser un viejo juego! :)
